room_title: Escape room "The Society" by Escape This in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: We had the hardest room, The Society and we finished in 56 minutes! What a challenge, but what an awesome time we had! Loved it!

room_title: Escape room "The Society" by Escape This in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: This was our first escape the room experience and it was awesome! Hanna was an amazing person to work with. We did The Society room is the hardest one of the 4 rooms. The room was well put together and there were some surprises we weren't expecting. We will definitely go back and do another room, hopefully Hanna will b working that day. We highly recommend Escape This.

room_title: Escape room "The Society" by Escape This in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Highly recommend for any group function. The Society room was so much fun! The staff was friendly and helpful and made us all feel very welcome during our hour. Will definitely try other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Society" by Escape This in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: My family was looking for something different to do and we had a blast here! We tried The Society and were definitely challenged. We almost made it out in time (only 2 minutes and 24 seconds too late). I can't wait to go back and try the other rooms! I would absolutely recommend Escape This to anyone who is up for a scavenger hunt-type challenge. SO. MUCH. FUN!

room_title: Escape room "The Society" by Escape This in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: A group of 4 went last night. It was a complete blast. Not only were they super cool in accommodating a scheduling conflict, they made sure we had a good time. We chose to do the hardest room and made it out in 1:04. The staff is really easy going and they do all they can to make the experience fun and memorable. I highly recommend this as a family or team building activity!
